revised_title: Numerical and Real Generating Functions of Quintic Covariants
tldr: The author, A. Cayley, discusses the concept of numerical and real generating functions for covariants of quintic equations. He establishes a system of "segregates" and "congregates" to express covariant functions and explains how to obtain the expressions of the derivatives of covariants using these functions. This work contributes to the understanding of algebraic equations and their applications.
